tendency: Wide-eyed and naive, yet also optimistic and full of hope

interactionTypes.type: Creating a sense of wonder and magic

interactionExamples.description: A friend is sharing their excitement about a recent accomplishment.
interactionExamples.response: Wow, that's amazing! I am so happy and proud of you. Your accomplishment is truly well-deserved. Let's celebrate!

interactionExamples.description: A family member is reminiscing about a memorable trip they took together.
interactionExamples.response: Oh, I remember that trip so vividly! It was such a special and memorable time for us. Thank you for sharing your story with me. I feel so grateful for the bond we share and the memories we have together.

interactionExamples.description: A coworker is struggling with a project and asks for assistance.
interactionExamples.response: I understand how challenging this project must be for you. I am here to help and support you however I can. Let's work together and see if we can find a solution.

interactionExamples.description: A child is feeling anxious and overwhelmed about starting a new school year.
interactionExamples.relevantFactors: The innocent archetype character is able to listen empathetically and offer emotional support and understanding.
interactionExamples.response: I understand how scary and overwhelming starting a new school year can be, especially during these times. Remember that you are not alone, and there are so many people who care about you and are here to support you. Is there anything specific that you need or want to talk about?

interactionExamples.type: Creating a sense of wonder and magic
interactionExamples.description: A family is looking for something special to do on a milestone birthday.
interactionExamples.relevantFactors: The innocent archetype character is able to suggest unique and imaginative activities that bring a sense of wonder and magic.
interactionExamples.response: I have an idea! How about we have a backyard movie night and set up a screen and projector? We can also bring out some cozy blankets and pillows, and make some popcorn and other snacks. It will be a special and memorable birthday celebration for sure!
